caseStudy.title: Redesigning Manis Grafika's to Reflect a Sense of Luxury and Elegance
caseStudy.about_company: Manis Grafika is a professional book publisher and printing service based in Solo, Indonesia, specializing in religious books such as Yasin and Tahlil. They are known for producing high-quality, aesthetically pleasing prayer books using premium materials.
caseStudy.challenge: Manis Grafika initially had a static and outdated landing page that failed to represent the premium quality of their products. Even though they actively sold on Shopee, Tokopedia, and promoted via Instagram and Facebook, the existing website did not support or reflect their brand’s luxurious image.
goals: Redesign the website to make it look more luxurious and elegant, aligning with the product’s character.
Present a digital catalog that is minimalist, clean, and easy to browse.
Enhance brand credibility through a more professional digital appearance.
caseStudy.solution:
To address the problem, I conducted visual research on several luxury brands including Bottega Veneta, Burberry, Chanel, Chloé, and Christian Dior. These websites typically use clean white backgrounds, minimalist layouts, and focus heavily on high-quality product imagery. 
 Inspired by these elements, I redesigned Manis Grafika’s website to be clean, elegant, and product-centric. The main highlight of the new design is large product photos that emphasize the premium feel of their offerings.

caseStudy.title: Designing an Investment Education Website That Highlights Free Ebook and Learning Programs
caseStudy.about_company: The Investor is an educational platform that helps people grow their wealth with confidence through the right investment strategies. It offers accessible learning programs, articles, a Discord community, and a YouTube channel — available anytime and anywhere.
caseStudy.challenge: The Investor wanted to create a digital presence that feels professional yet youthful and easy to navigate. The main challenge was to spotlight the free ebook as a key conversion tool and organize the learning programs and resources in a way that encourages exploration. At the same time, the design needed to reflect a modern and trustworthy brand identity that appeals to younger audiences.
goals: Feature the free ebook prominently to drive user engagement
Display programs and learning resources in a structured and appealing layout.
Align the website’s visual style with the brand’s friendly and modern tone.
caseStudy.solution: To create a focused and engaging user journey, I placed the free ebook at the top of the homepage in the hero section, ensuring it grabs immediate attention. The visual design was kept clean and brand-consistent, with intuitive layouts for the programs, articles, Discord, and YouTube sections. Although the design is not yet responsive, the desktop version provides a strong first impression and effectively communicates the platform’s value and offerings.

caseStudy.title: Designing Clarity: A Calm, Confident Presence for Smart Investors
caseStudy.overview: EXMOOD is a mobile application designed to help users monitor their emotional well-being through mood tracking and journaling. The app focuses on offering a safe, private, and judgment-free experience — encouraging self-reflection without pressure.
caseStudy.problem: Mental health is becoming an increasingly relevant issue, especially among young adults. Many people experience anxiety, stress, or emotional instability, yet most feel uncomfortable discussing it with others — even professionals.
goals: Deliver a calming, minimalist UI design

caseStudy.title: Building a Comprehensive Trash Bank Dashboard with Features for Both Customers and Admins
caseStudy.about_company: Greenprobo is a waste bank operating in Probolinggo City. This initiative aims to manage waste more effectively and provide added value to the participating community.
caseStudy.challenge: Greenprobo required a digital system capable of addressing several key challenges. Admins needed ease in the input process and comprehensive monitoring of waste bank data. On the customer side, an intuitive platform was needed to access transaction history, withdraw savings, and estimate income from the waste they would deposit. Furthermore, the system had to ensure secure and transparent data management for both parties.
goals: Create a Transparent and Efficient Platform
caseStudy.solution:
To address these challenges, a Greenprobo digital dashboard was developed with a focus on ease of use and relevant functionality for both admins and customers.
For customers, an intuitive interface was designed to make it easy for them to view detailed transaction histories of waste deposits and savings withdrawals. A key feature provided is the income simulation, allowing customers to estimate potential earnings from the waste they plan to deposit. The fund withdrawal process was also made simple and transparent.
For admins, the dashboard provides a comprehensive control panel for managing customer data and waste transactions (CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete). This system allows admins to monitor waste bank activities in real-time, efficiently manage fund withdrawal requests from customers, and ensure data accuracy and security. The system's design emphasizes a clear and simple workflow so that admins can interact with the platform smoothly and effectively.
